name: Holy Guacamole!
description:
Holy Guacamole!

It's guacamole o'clock in this tiny kitchen! 

Become the ingredients and embark on a quest to enter the mixing bowl. Alex the Avocado, Tammy Tomato, Oliver Onion, Lucy Lime, and Sal the Salt Shaker need your help to get them where they belong--together.

This 2D puzzle-platformer will stretch your imagination and immerse you in a world of food, wind, and fire. The mechanics are simple--move and jump--but the possibilities are endless!

Credits:

  • Levels designed by Diana Shao
  • Food artwork from the Unity Asset Store: "Free Pixel Food" by Henry Software
  • Walls, ceilings, floors artwork from Unity Asset Store: "Free 8-Bit Pixel Pack" by Super Icon Ltd.
  • All other artwork/animation original content created by Diana Shao using Pixilart.com
  • Music: "Little Idea" from Bensound.com
